main.name: Yihan Li
main.occupation: A CS master from UW Madison
main.description: I enjoy data engineering and app developing
main.bio: Hi there! I am Yihan! I'm a master student from the department of computer science from University of Wisconsin - Madison. I used to be a Ph.D. student from environmental science, however along the journey I realised my passion existed in creating software that can solve real world problems. With this passion, I have now served my community by web applications about course reviews of UW Madison, local social life, video game assistants, and more as a full stack developer.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to talk about possible work opportunities!

education.description: Chair of Student Goverment; Rewarded with Top National Scholarship

work.title: Full Stack Developer
work.description: A web application for League of Legend players to visualize match history, most and best played champions, check statistics for any user specific to any champion and predict win rates by simulating real games.

work.title: Full Stack Developer
work.description: An eCommerce website application for fitness industry with full functionality including registering and logging in, adding products to carts, and checking out and making payments with real cards.

work.title: Full Stack Developer
work.description: An Instagram-like website sharing interesting photos the caption of which will be the most liked comment.

work.title: Full Stack Developer
work.description: A social network web application based on student reviews about courses in University of Wisconsin to help students learn what courses their peers took and how they rated the courses.
